title: Bug 9654Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second column could be merged.
OB: The marking between the button and list is too large. The top button is not aligned with the dialog top. The table does not have a label to contain a mnemonic. Multiple selection is not allowed in the list. The signature preview is not appearing as a label that wraps. The signature preview does not have the background color set to the same color as a hover.
EB: The marking between the button and list should be reduced. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. The table should have a label to contain a mnemonic. Multiple selection should be allowed in the list. The signature preview must be a label that wraps. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover.
SR:
1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog.
2. Observe the marking between the button and list.
3. Observe the alignment of the top button and dialog top.
4. Observe if the table has a label to contain a mnemonic.
5. Attempt to select multiple items in the list.
6. Observe the appearance of the signature preview.
7. Hover over the signature preview and observe the background color.
